Tokens.HL2_GameOver_Object:
IT ENDS HERE
THE FREEMAN HAS FAILED TO PRESERVE RESOURCES
DEEMED CRITICAL TO VICTORY
INESCAPABLE GLIMPSES OF DOOM CLOUD THE VORTESSENCE
Tokens.HL2_GameOver_Ally:
SO IT ENDS
THE FREEMAN HAS FAILED TO PRESERVE A LIFE REQUIRED FOR VICTORY
SUCH ARE THE SHAPES WE SEE IN THE VORTESSENCE
Tokens.HL2_GameOver_Timer:
ALL IS DONE
THE FREEMAN'S FAILURE TO SEIZE A SWIFT VICTORY
LEADS TO OUR TOTAL DEFEAT
Tokens.HL2_GameOver_Stuck:
ASSIGNMENT: TERMINATED
SUBJECT: FREEMAN
REASON: DEMONSTRATION OF EXCEEDINGLY POOR JUDGEMENT
Tokens.Episodic_GameOver_AlyxDead:
THE ALYX VANCE HAS DIED
WITHOUT HER WE CANNOT PERSEVERE
Tokens.EP2_GameOver_AlyxLeft:
THE FREEMAN MUST PROCEED WITH THE ALYX VANCE,
ELSE OUR STRUGGLE IS DOOMED TO FAILURE
THOSE WHO DO NOT LEARN FROM THEIR MISTAKES
ARE DOOMED TO AN ENDLESS VORTAL LOOP
Tokens.EP2_GameOver_RocketDestroyed:
THE ROCKET HAS BEEN DESTROYED
MAGNUSSON'S MISGIVINGS ABOUT THE FREEMAN
 ARE COMPLETELY JUSTIFIED.
THE GAME NOW ENDS
Tokens.FR_Ending:
SUBJECT: TRAVELLER
STATUS: COMATOSE
RECOVERY IN PROGRESS
GOAL: OFF-WORLD TRANSFER SHORTLY
AFTER RECOVERY COMPLETION

WELCOME HOME.
Tokens.FR_TutorialEnding:
ASSIGNMENT: COMPLETED
SUBJECT: TRAVELLER
REASON: COMPLETED BASIC
COMBAT AND MOVEMENT TRAINING
Tokens.FR_HardcoreEnding:
ASSIGNMENT: TERMINATED
SUBJECT: TRAVELLER
REASON: FAILURE TO ELIMINATE
OVERWHELMING HOSTILE THREAT
Tokens.HL2_OICW:
H&K XM29 OICW PROTOTYPE
(OBJECTIVE INDIVIDUAL COMBAT WEAPON)
Tokens.HL2_GATLING:
D-CLASS PORTABLE ROTARY MACHINE GUN
(GATLING GUN)
Tokens.HL2_FlechetteGun:
D-CLASS PROTOTYPE COMBINE FLECHETTE RIFLE
(MODIFIED COMBINE LASER RIFLE)
Tokens.Valve_Hint_CarryTurret: %+use% OR GRAVITY GUN TO PICK UP TURRET
Tokens.HL2_Credits_Kleiner: Harry S. Robins - Dr. Isaac Kleiner
Tokens.HL2_Credits_FacesThanks: Thanks to the following for the use of their faces:
Tokens.FIREFIGHTRELOADED_Modding_IronsightHint:
Keypad 4 = move left
Keypad 6 = move right
Keypad 8 = move up
Keypad 2 = move down
Keypad + = forward
Keypad - = back
Keypad 1 = swing left
Keypad 3 = swing right
Page Up = roll left
Page Down = roll right
Keypad home = rotate down
Keypad Del = rotate up
Keypad 5 = Display coordinates
Tokens.GameUI_Store_InsufficientFunds: You do not have enough Kash to complete the purchase.
Tokens.GameUI_Store_PlayerIsDead: You cannot buy anything from the Store because you are dead. Respawn to buy something here.
Tokens.GameUI_MaximumLevel:
YOU HAVE REACHED THE
MAXIMUM LEVEL!
Tokens.GameUI_FIREFIGHTRELOADED_Options_Msg:
If you want to edit options related to the game itself,
go to the 'ADVANCED OPTIONS' menu.
There, you can edit difficulty settings, and more!
Tokens.GameUI_Performance_HopperCount: Maximum number of hoppers dropped by scanners.
Tokens.GameUI_HuntersLaugh: Hunters laugh at the player if the player reaches low health
Tokens.GameUI_HL2Flashlight: Uses the HEV suit's auxiliary battery
Tokens.GameUI_ChangeMaxSpeedFR: Fast player speed, uses walking instead of sprinting.
Tokens.GameUI_GamemodeNotice: If you want to change your Difficulty Level, go to the Advanced Options menu.
Tokens.GameUI_PlayerDeathmatchSpawn_DM: Spawn in random defined places (like HL2DM).
Tokens.GameUI_PlayerDeathmatchSpawn_HL2: Spawn in one defined place (like HL2).
Tokens.GameUI_ArmorMode_HL1: Absorbs 80% of all damage, each armor point is 1/2 HP (HL1)
Tokens.GameUI_ArmorMode_HL2: Absorbs 80% of all damage, each armor point is 1 HP (HL2)
Tokens.GameUI_ArmorMode_FR: Absorbs 90% of all damage, each armor point is 1/2 HP (FR)
Tokens.GameUI_PlayerDropWeaponsOnDeath: Toggle Player Dropping Weapons on Death
Tokens.GameUI_HealthChargerUsesMoney: Toggle Health Charger using Kash to operate
Tokens.GameUI_SuitChargerUsesMoney: Toggle HEV Suit Charger using Kash to operate
Tokens.GameUI_RagdollFadeDelay: Ragdoll Fade Delay (Goes up to 600.0, which is 10 minutes)
Tokens.GameUI_SpawnerHideFromPlayer: Toggle if enemies should only spawn if the player is not looking.
Tokens.GameUI_SpawnerDifficultyAdjust: Spawn time is adjusted by game difficulty.
Tokens.GameUI_SpawnerDeckAdjust: How much to adjust map-specific spawn time on Steam Deck
Tokens.GameUI_ToggleEconomy: Toggle the Store and Kash Collecting.
Tokens.GameUI_ToggleKillSound: Toggle voice lines when the player kills an enemy.
Tokens.GameUI_ToggleDeathSound: Toggle voice lines when the player dies.
Tokens.GameUI_TogglePerkSound: Toggle voice lines when the player gets a perk.
Tokens.GameUI_ToggleHitSound: Toggle voice lines when the player is damaged.
Tokens.GameUI_WallrunDirectControl: Require a move button to be pressed before wallrunning.
Tokens.GameUI_HeadcrablessDamage: Toggle damaging Zombies if their Headcrabs are not attached.
Tokens.GameUI_LoneWolfMode: Lone Wolf (No allies come to help you. No Bugbait.)
Tokens.GameUI_StoreNotificationBuy: Toggle Store Notifications for successful purchases
Tokens.GameUI_StoreNotificationDeny: Toggle Store Notifications for failed purchases
Tokens.GameUI_ShootInZoom: Allow the player to shoot while zoomed in.
Tokens.GameUI_MetropoliceManhacks: Allow Metropolice to spawn with Manhacks.
Tokens.GameUI_CombineSoldierGrenades: Allow Combine Soldiers to spawn with frag grenades.
Tokens.GameUI_CombineShotGrenades: Allow Combine Shotgunners to spawn with frag grenades.
Tokens.GameUI_CombinePrisonGrenades: Allow Combine Prison Guards to spawn with frag grenades.
Tokens.GameUI_CombineEliteGrenades: Allow Combine Elites to spawn with frag grenades.
Tokens.GameUI_CombineAceGrenades: Allow Combine Aces to spawn with frag grenades.
Tokens.GameUI_ZombieArmorRarity: Rarity of Armored Headcrab Zombies outside of NIGHTMARE
Tokens.GameUI_StoreSoundBuy: Toggle Store sound for successful purchases
Tokens.GameUI_StoreSoundDeny: Toggle Store sound for failed purchases
Tokens.GameUI_PlayerDamageSounds: Toggle sounds when you're taking damage
Tokens.GameUI_ShieldMode_Ace_All: Spawn shields on all Combine Aces
Tokens.GameUI_ShieldMode_Ace_Random: Spawn shields on some Combine Aces
Tokens.GameUI_AdvisorStagingNum: Max objects an Advisor can carry at once
Tokens.GameUI_AdvisorBulletResistStagingNum: Max objects a Shielded Advisor can carry at once
Tokens.GameUI_Perks_InfiniteAuxPower: Toggle the INFINITE AUX POWER Perk
Tokens.GameUI_Perks_HelthRegenRate: Toggle the HEALTH REGENERATION RATE Perk
Tokens.GameUI_SkillVeryHard: Very Hard (Health Regen is a perk)
Tokens.GameUI_VeryHardDescription: Enemies are nearly death incarnate; a high skill level is required.
Tokens.GameUI_NightmareDescription: Enemies will wipe the floor with your mutilated corpse; you will die.
Tokens.GameUI_HardcoreMode: Hardcore (Gravity Gun and melee only. Permadeath on.)
Tokens.GameUI_NPCRemove: Remove NPCs after a specified amount of time
Tokens.GameUI_NPCRemoveTime: Amount of time NPCs should wait before being removed (secs.)
Tokens.GameUI_NPCRemoveTimeRare: How much longer Rare NPCs should wait before being removed (secs.)
Tokens.GameUI_NPCFPSControl: NPC removal is controlled by FPS
Tokens.GameUI_SpawnerFPSControl: NPC spawners are controlled by FPS
Tokens.GameUI_SpawnerFPS: Minimum framerate to temporarily disable spawners
Tokens.GameUI_ClassicFire: Classic 2004 Fire (Can only be set in main menu)
Tokens.GameUI_PumpSecondaryFire: Force Shotgun pump on double shot
Tokens.GameUI_RewardSystem_1: Give weapons, items, Kash Bonuses, and Perks when you level up.
Tokens.GameUI_RewardSystem_2: Give only Perks when you level up.
Tokens.GameUI_FasterWeaponSwitch: Allow the player to fire right when the weapon is deployed.

Tokens.Valve_Hint_Alt_Weapon_Crossbow: %+attack2% NORMAL CROSSBOW SCOPE %toggle_ironsight% TOGGLE QUICK-SCOPE %+ironsight% HOLD QUICK-SCOPE
Tokens.Valve_Hint_Alt_Weapon_Sniper_Rifle: %+attack2% SNIPER RIFLE SCOPE %+attack3% INCREASE SCOPE MAGNIFICATION
Tokens.Valve_Hint_Alt_Weapon_Frag: %+attack% THROW GRENADE %+attack2% DROP GRENADE %+attack3% SWITCH TO FRAGMENTATION/INCENDIARY GRENADES
Tokens.Valve_Hint_Alt_Weapon_Katana: KILLS WITH THE KATANA DURING BULLETTIME WILL INCREASE YOUR SPEED AND HEALTH
Tokens.Valve_Hud_DualWield_Pickup_Weapon_Pistol: %invnext% SWITCH TO PISTOL %toggle_dualwield% TO DUAL-WIELD PISTOL
Tokens.Valve_Hud_DualWield_Pickup_Weapon_RPG: %invnext% SWITCH TO RPG %toggle_dualwield% TO DUAL-WIELD RPG
Tokens.valve_hint_warning_Weapon_Railgun:
%+reload% BATTERY AT CRITICAL LEVELS
STABLIZE BATTERY AND CHARGE SUIT
TO PREVENT AN EXPLOSION
Tokens.Valve_Hint_Store: %gamepadui_openstore% OPEN THE STORE %+grapple% USE THE GRAPPLING BEAM
Tokens.Valve_Level_Up_fmt: YOU HAVE LEVELED UP TO LEVEL %s1
Tokens.Cannot_Be_Spectator: This server does not allow spectating
Tokens.FR_Store_GamepadUI_AlreadyPurchased: YOU CANNOT PURCHASE MORE OF THIS ITEM
Tokens.FR_OldSpawner: Restore pre-ENDGAME spawners (endless enemies, legacy gamemodes)
Tokens.GameUI_GamemodeSelect: Gamemode (Requires map restart and the above option)
Tokens.GameUI_CombineSecondary: Allow use of the Shotgun's double shot by NPCs.
Tokens.GameUI_CombineSecondaryChance: The chance an NPC will use the shotgun's double shot.
Tokens.GameUI_AlliesUseModel: Allow allies to use the player's current model.
Tokens.GameUI_PlayerShadows: Dynamic Player Model Shadows in Third Person
Tokens.GameUI_CombineTacticalVariants: Combine enemies spawn with random tactical variants.
Tokens.GameUI_PlayerHealth: Default amount of health the player will spawn with.
Tokens.GameUI_PlayerArmor: Default amount of armor the player will spawn with.
Tokens.GameUI_PlayerMaxArmor: Maximum amount of armor the player can have.
Tokens.GameUI_PlayerBaseXP: Base amount of XP to base progression calculations on.
Tokens.GameUI_StalkerLasers: Allow Stalkers to increase or decrease laser power level.
Tokens.GameUI_RewardAttempts: Number of attempts to refresh the reward list.
Tokens.GameUI_ScannerBlindMode_OB360: Half a second (Orange Box on Xbox 360)
Tokens.GameUI_MakeHealthRegenPerk: Make Health Regeneration a rewardable Perk
Tokens.GameUI_MakeHealthRegenPerkInMutators: Make Health Regeneration a rewardable Perk in other modes
Tokens.GameUI_GrappleBatteryDrain: Allow the Grapple to use the HEV Suit Battery
Tokens.GameUI_AdvisorPrematureDroning: Allow the creation of Advisor Drones in Stage 1
Tokens.GameUI_AdvisorDroning: Allow the creation of Advisor Drones
Tokens.GameUI_RailgunOverchargeLimit: Maximum Railgun Ammo Limit (0 is off)
Tokens.GameUI_DeckOverride: Enable Steam Deck setting overrides (Steam Deck only)
Tokens.GameUI_SndPauseLoseFocus: Pause music playing through FMOD while the game window is in the background.
Tokens.GameUI_SndPauseGamePaused: Pause music playing through FMOD while the game is paused.
Tokens.GameUI_DeathcamMode_FP_Switch: Switch to another view if First Person is too close to the ground.
Tokens.GameUI_DeathcamMode_FP_Switch_MinDist: Min. distance to switch between camera views.
Tokens.GameUI_FMOD_Credit: This mod uses FMOD. FMOD created by Firelight Technologies Pty Ltd.
Tokens.GameUI_SaveWeapons_Store: Save Weapons obtained through the in-game Store
Tokens.GameUI_SaveWeapons_Drops: Save Weapons obtained through NPC drops
Tokens.GameUI_BossGoTo_DroneKill: When applicable, teleport to the boss battle after killing an Advisor Drone.
Tokens.GameUI_BossGoTo_OnDeath: When applicable, teleport to the boss battle on death.
Tokens.GameUI_BossGoTo_Level: The level Advisor Drones will teleport the player at.
Tokens.GameUI_BossGoTo_ClassicKillCount: (Classic) The kill count Advisor Drones will teleport the player at.
Tokens.Tutorial_BasicMovement: %+forward% MOVE FORWARD %+back% MOVE BACKWARD %+moveleft% STRAFE LEFT %+moveright% STRAFE RIGHT %+jump% JUMP %+duck% CROUCH
Tokens.Tutorial_WeaponShoot: %+attack% PRIMARY FIRE %+attack2% SECONDARY FIRE %+reload% RELOAD %+use% INTERACT %toggle_ironsight% IRONSIGHT %+attack3% SWITCH FIRE MODE %+kick% KICK %toggle_bullettime% BULLETTIME
Tokens.Tutorial_EnemyKilled: %gamepadui_openstore% STORE %buymenu% OLD STORE %+attack% KILL ENEMIES TO GET KASH AND XP
Tokens.Tutorial_Grapple: %+grapple% TO GRAPPLE TO THE LEDGE. THIS WEAPON USES YOUR SUIT BATTERY TO FUNCTION. %+kick% KICK WHILE GRAPPLING TO DO EXTRA KICK DAMAGE
Tokens.Tutorial_AdvancedMovement1: %+jump% JUMP REPEATEDLY TO BUNNY HOP %+duck% CROUCH WHILE RUNNING TO POWER SLIDE
Tokens.Tutorial_AdvancedMovement2:
BEGIN A WALL RUN BY JUMPING AND STRAFING TOWARDS A WALL
HOLD THE STRAFE BUTTON TO STAY ATTACHED TO THE WALL
YOU CAN ALSO GRAPPLE TO A WALL AND KEEP THE BUTTON HELD TO WALLRUN
JUMPING OFF A WALL WILL MAKE YOU DISMOUNT FROM IT
Tokens.Tutorial_Survive: SURVIVE UNTIL YOU GET TO LEVEL 3
Tokens.Tutorial_HealthOvercharge:
WHEN YOU GET DAMAGED, TAKING COVER WILL SLOWLY HEAL YOU
PICKING UP HEALTH WILL INSTANTLY HEAL YOU
PICKING UP MORE HEALTH THAN YOUR MAXIMUM WILL OVERCHARGE IT
OVERCHARGED HEALTH WILL SLOWLY TRICKLE DOWN BACK TO THE MAXIMUM AMOUNT
Tokens.Tutorial_Explosives:
USING ANY EXPLOSIVE WEAPON WILL MAKE YOU AIRBORNE
CERTAIN WEAPONS WILL HEADSHOT SOME ENEMIES
CERTAIN WEAPONS MAY ALLOW YOU TO GAIN EXTRA KASH AND XP
Tokens.Tutorial_Railgun:
%+attack3%OVERCHARGE THE RAILGUN'S BATTERY WITH YOUR SUIT BATTERY
YOU CAN ALSO WAIT FOR IT TO CHARGE IF IT IS UNDER 100
IT WILL CHARGE FASTER IF HOLSTERED.
Tokens.Tutorial_Grapple_Boss: %+grapple% TO GRAPPLE TO THE WALL %+duck% TO GRAPPLE FASTER %+kick% KICK WHILE GRAPPLING TO DO EXTRA KICK DAMAGE %+moveleft% WALL RUN LEFT %+moveright% WALL RUN RIGHT
Tokens.GameUI_GamepadUI_SliderTooltip:
Click on the slider to begin editing, then use the mouse wheel to adjust.

Navigate to another option or click the slider again to save the setting.
